com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.notification
Class NotificationFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.notification.NotificationFactory

public class NotificationFactory
extends HibernateFactory

NotificationFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.monitoring.notification.* objects from the database.
